lead_paragraph: Baba Ramdev has emerged as the leader of the “Baba Cool Movement” — a group of spiritual men who are marketing health-based products based on the ancient Indian medicinal system.

byline.contributor: Suhasini Raj and Hari Kumar contributed reporting from New Delhi.

headline.print_headline: A Yoga Master, the King of ‘Baba Cool,’ Stretches Out an Empire
headline.main: A Yoga Master, the King of ‘Baba Cool,’ Stretches Out an Empire

snippet: Baba Ramdev has emerged as the leader of the “Baba Cool Movement” — a group of spiritual men who are marketing health-based products based on the ancient Indian medicinal system.
abstract: Profile of Baba Ramdev, Indian swami who is leader of 'Baba Cool Movement,' group of spiritual men marketing healthy consumer items based on ancient Indian medicinal system of Ayurveda; movement's success has been helped by Prime Min Narendra Modi's emphasis on value of ancient Hindu practices.
